Title: Exodus (1)
Plot: Sharon helps the Resistance on New Caprica as Adama leads Galactica on a dangerous rescue operation.Tyrol races to save Cally from the execution squad. Meanwhile Anders uncovers treachery among the humans.D'Anna Biers/Number Three meets the Oracle Selloi after having strange dreams about the temple.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: Amanda Plummer, Erica Cerra, Kate Vernon, Kandyse McClure, Tahmoh Penikett, Alessandro Juliani, Nicki Clyne, Callum Keith Rennie, Madeline Parker, Donnelly Rhodes, Matthew Bennett, Leah Cairns
